116  // lambda/mlambda integer least-square estimation
117  // a Float parameters (n x 1)
118  // Q Covariance matrix of float parameters (n x n)
119  // F Fixed solutions (n x m)
120  // s Sum of squared residulas of fixed solutions (1 x m)
121  // m Number of fixed solutions
122  // status (0:ok,other:error)
